{"blocks":[{"key":"9mekp","text":"Aliquot and store at   until use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":21,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5slm3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"A1BCF820ED5211EC81AD01A90241F0C1","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-80","unit":10}}}}
